features: One 12 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Natural Moisturizing Coconut Hand & Body Lotion
Deeply nourishes and moisturizes extra dry skin
Certified organic, plant-based formula made with botanicals and essential oils
No GMOs, parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, phthalates or sulfates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Deeply nourish and moisturize extra dry skin with Avalon Organics Moisturizing Coconut Bath & Shower Gel. Made with organic botanicals and essential oils, this plant-based formula provides intense hydration to soften and restore skin. Virgin coconut oil, avocado oil, shea butter, aloe and vitamin E work together to replenish skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Nourishing Lavender Bath & Shower Gel Refreshing Lemon Bath & Shower Gel Revitalizing Peppermint Hand & Body Lotion Rejuvenating Rosemary Hand Soap More Better-For-You Products from Avalon Organics Lavender essential oil, quinoa protein and aloe work together to replenish skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Lemon essential oil, safflower oil, aloe, shea butter and nutrient-rich beta-glucan work together to restore the skin's lipid balance, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Peppermint essential oil, orange peel and vitamin E, known for their rejuvenating and moisturizing properties, cleanse and nourish your skin. Rosemary essential oil, quinoa protein and vitamin E, known for their moisturizing and purifying properties, cleanse and rejuvenate hands with every wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good quality organic lotion that works great and smells wonderful. Moisturizes well and isn’t greasy. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Been using this lotion and I really love it. It doesn't have any harsh chemicals like other lotions do. The smell is light and pleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm extremely happy with my Amazon purchase! The "hand and body lotion" arrived in perfect condition and exceeded my expectations. The product quality is outstanding, feels luxurious on the skin, and has a delightful, long-lasting scent. The packaging was impeccable, and the seller's excellent service made this a top-notch experience. Highly recommend both the lotion and the seller on Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My only problem with organic lotion is t he smell is too strong to put on my body. I used it to roll up may hair at night. I took the rollers out this morning and It moisturized my hair. Not a strong smell in my hair. I am loving this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Coconut Scent and It's Vegan!
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion so much, I use it all of the time. It's vegan and so am I so buying it allows me to live by my standards. It smells so good I could almost eat the coconut inside. It also works really well for moisturizing super dry hands. I don't know if there's anything I don't like about this lotion. I buy it all of the time. That scent is almost addictive to me. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great peppermint smell!
reviews.reviewText: Love this lotion - it is NOT greasy but very smooth. It moisturizes perfectly and goes a long way. The Peppermint smell is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read a review that said it smells like coconut and suntan lotion. So I was all for that and it being natural also. Unfortunately it really has barely any scent to it and the bottle does not have a protective covering over it. Its as if it was already opened and returned. Not sure whether to chance using it or send back ):

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a lotion that wasn't full of chemicals, and didn't make my skin feel like it's covered in wax. This absorbs quickly, but leaves my skin soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic and doesn’t leave my skin oily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this ! Keeps skin soft no nasties in it and no strong smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an organic hand lotion for keeping hands moisturised, and this does the trick. However, although the coconut smell is pleasant in the bottle, when you rub it into your skin the smell becomes a bit odd and rather acidic. Hence only three stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: i love the smell , it also goes along way
